snippet: The pilot, who survived the crash, told investigators that it was not an accident, federal law enforcement officials said....
abstract: Federal Bureau of Investigation is looking into allegations that crash of small plane in East Hartford, Conn, which killed passenger Feras M Freitekh, may have been intentional.

byline.original: By ADAM GOLDMAN and CHRISTOPHER MELE

lead_paragraph: The pilot, who survived the crash, told investigators that it was not an accident, federal law enforcement officials said.

headline.main: F.B.I. Investigating if Fatal Plane Crash in East Hartford Was Intentional
headline.print_headline: Plane Crash Near Hartford May Have Been Intentional
